definition: To enhance or improve something, typically used to describe the action of making something better or more satisfactory. It is commonly used in the context of refining or upgrading various aspects, such as skills, performance, quality, or conditions.

examples.english: I want to improve my German.
We need to correct our mistakes.

examples.german: Er versucht, seine Fähigkeiten zu verbessern.
examples.english: He is trying to enhance his skills.
